title: Create Your Account
body: To activate full protection, enter: full name, home address, phone, date of birth, and card number.

choices.label: Fill the form
choices.feedback: Risky choice. This page asks for sensitive data it should not need (card number). Never share bank details to ‘activate protection’.

choices.label: Stop and check the website
choices.feedback: Correct. Check the web address (URL), the padlock (HTTPS) and the company name. Avoid sharing bank or card data on sign-up pages.
